Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:20.09]We were lovers for the first time
[00:22.66]Running all the red lights
[00:24.50]The middle finger was our peace sign, yeah
[00:29.12]We were sipping on emotions
[00:31.18]Smoking and inhaling every moment
[00:33.76]It was reckless and we owned it, yeah, yeah
[00:36.93]
[00:37.78]We were high and we were sober
[00:40.18]We were under, we were over
[00:42.34]We were young and now I'm older
[00:45.06]But I'd do it all again
[00:47.24]
[00:48.09]Getting drunk on a train track
[00:49.84]Way back, when we tried our first cigarettes
[00:52.69]Ten dollars was a fat stack
[00:54.41]I'd do it all again
[00:57.26]Bomber jacket and a snapback
[00:58.98]Your dad's black Honda was a Maybach
[01:01.80]Re: Stacks on the playback
[01:03.46]I'd do it all again
[01:06.06]
[01:26.37]We were lovers on a wild ride
[01:28.97]Speeding for the finish line
[01:30.98]Come until the end of our time, yeah
[01:35.48]Started off as a wildfire
[01:37.50]Burning down the bridges to our empire
[01:40.01]Our love was something they could admire, yeah, yeah
[01:43.06]
[01:44.07]We were high and we were sober
[01:46.41]We were under, we were over
[01:48.56]We were young and now I'm older
[01:51.29]But I'd do it all again
[01:53.35]
[01:54.43]Getting drunk on a train track
[01:56.18]Way back, when we tried our first cigarettes
[01:59.03]Ten dollars was a fat stack
[02:00.68]I'd do it all again
[02:03.47]Bomber jacket and a snapback
[02:05.22]Your dad's black Honda was a Maybach
[02:08.03]Re: Stacks on the playback
[02:09.79]I'd do it all again
[02:12.36]
